website_summaries.verdict: If you want to start your bonsai project from seeds and prefer variety, this kit isn't for you. However, it is a good option if you like the idea of beginning with an established jade plant.
pros: Gives you a head start with your bonsai project, as it comes with a 3-year old dwarf jade plant
Kit also includes useful accessories, such an attractive container, pruning shears, humidity tray, and soil
cons: A few trees looked sickly upon arrival
but the 30-day satisfaction guarantee makes this a minor hassle, not a deal breaker
Lacks variety compared to most kits that start with seeds

customer_reviews.title: Best Bonsai Kit on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Professionally done!! Jade arrived in very good condition!! I really enjoyed going through the entire process of potting this myself. Perfect for the beginner and for the novice. This is the best Bonsai kit on Amazon. All items are real, no seeds in this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Mathenia

customer_reviews.title: Expectations Exceeded
customer_reviews.text: I’m truly impressed by this bonsai kit. My tree arrived in great condition, and everything was packaged perfectly. The included extras all seem to be very high quality (soil, pot, tray/rocks, and pruning shears). I almost feel like I need to say something negative just to let people know this is a real review, but I can’t, my expectations were truly exceeded. I’m already researching which tree I am going to buy next from Brussel’s.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to get started.....
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT way to get started! Everything you need in one box with instructions. The tree is beautiful and the soil and other items are excellent quality and condition.
customer_reviews.author: E. Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Birthday Present
customer_reviews.text: Plant arrived in questionable condition. It’s already nearly dead, and it doesn’t look as if it could possibly recover. Yes I live in a cold climate, and yes, the seller shipped it to the cold climate without hesitation. I’m very disappointed and will be returning the plant. Perhaps I’ll try again when the weather gets hot. Update: The plant completely died within a couple of days. I was going to return it, but there’s no option for return.
customer_reviews.author: K. Tolbert

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed. My aunt sent an Amazon GC for my bday and I was excited to buy myself a bonsai. As soon as it arrived I opened it carefully and handled it according to directions. It looked good, but within a couple days started dropping leaves. I assumed it was just a minor shock from being shipped. Leaves kept falling. I thought new ones would grow in. Instead they all just fell off. By the time I gave up on nursing it back, it was beyond the return window (my fault, but I really thought with my green thumb I could get it to recover). Such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: ... live plants but the one I got was in great shape and was easy to transplant because of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Was unsure of buying live plants but the one I got was in great shape and was easy to transplant because of the full kit that came with it - would suggest getting a kit of bonsai tools as well as the main tool this comes with is a pair of scissors. 3-4 days after a massive pruning and I already got buds popping off. Just remember that initial pruning WILL make it look sparse. If you're looking for something that instantly looks wonderful then you should not be shopping for a bonsai.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie K

customer_reviews.title: The cutest and healthiest!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is 1 of the 3 trees I have purchased from this seller, and I am soo happy with it... I thought I would see it bloom until next spring but to my surprise it has pink little buds already ❤. Thank you! As long as I keep recieving beautiful little trees I will forever purchase from this seller 😊
customer_reviews.author: destiny101

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like it, it is very small, which I love because I can shape it to my liking as it grows, is been with me for about 2 weeks and it is doing well so far, the pot and soil that came with are working great, do not love the shears, but who cares I have better ones, but if you do not, this will do the trick for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: Raf.

customer_reviews.title: Most of the soil was out of the planter when I opened the box.
customer_reviews.text: Package looked like it had been drop kicked. Most of the soil was out of the planter when I opened the box. I tried my best to keep it alive but it died this past month. I've learned my lesson and will buy local from now on.
customer_reviews.author: rap80

customer_reviews.title: Great bonsai plant!
customer_reviews.text: We love our bonsai! The live tree arrived very fresh and alive. We placed it under the light of our Aerogarden, and it seems to really like that light. The instructions were very clear and told us how to maintain our plant with care. It was really surprising this came from our home state!
customer_reviews.author: BiloxiBoi

customer_reviews.title: Unable to resuscitate
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrived on our doorstep we were very excited by the outside presentation. However, upon opening the box, we discovered a pretty dead plant with a crushed flower smashed on the top. We followed the instructions on the box which weren't very clear about maintaining the tree. Its been about 2 weeks and the tree surprisingly looks even more deceased than when it arrived. We'll keep watering our tree but it seems like we wasted $40 on this bonsai.
customer_reviews.author: Prea

customer_reviews.title: Got Bonsai?
customer_reviews.text: This jade bonsai arrived in great shape. The packaging of the kit was more like it was protecting Steuben glassware. The bonsai itself was nicely shaped and the set-up took only a few minutes. I am happy with the purchase and will recommend Brussel's to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: 4owl

customer_reviews.title: Supposed to be easy...Murdered it..
customer_reviews.text: First Bonsia...thought this was the easiest one to grow. Apparently Im a murderer...I killed it within a month :(
customer_reviews.author: Kent City

customer_reviews.title: Love it! And look how beautiful it is!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Bonsai tree! I bought it for my mother for mother's day 5/13/18 it had no flowers on it and it came in a kit that you had to put together. But it looks amazing now 5/23/18 (picture from now that date). I will buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Third purchase from Brussel’s and very pleased once again! Arrived in perfect condition and a pleasure to plant it.
customer_reviews.author: T U

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: This was birthday gift to my best friend. She loved it and said it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Trudie

customer_reviews.title: Dead within 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions to plant the tree carefully. I then put it outside and checked water and on it carefully. Unfortunately, it turned brown and lost leave within a month and a half. There doesn’t seem to be an option to contact seller, so leaving this review.
customer_reviews.author: BLN

customer_reviews.title: deceptive photo
customer_reviews.text: Don't purchase this item if you want blooms. Purchased this as a Mother's Day gift and it had neither blooms or buds, and so my mom received no flowers. Made me look like a bad daughter -- boooooo for Brussel's!
customer_reviews.author: Perplexed Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my husband who was interested in learning how to make a bonsai. He enjoyed learning the basic skills with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: karen r

customer_reviews.title: dwarf jade
customer_reviews.text: I do all according description but after 2 week bonsai lost all leaves and die.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lavin

customer_reviews.title: Nature’s art
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful gift for those who enjoy art and beauty.
customer_reviews.author: dorcas haddock

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It came package just right. It was alive and well. It was very easy to transplant. I turned it and pruned it to make it look how I wanted it to. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Pickle

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Dying
customer_reviews.text: Impressive packaging. Tree arrived brown and dried out. Huge root ball, had to be severely cut down (per instructions) to fit small pot. Tree never recovered and was completely dead within one week. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce J. Rydin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for hubby
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit with everything to get you started. Hubby always wanted to try his hand at bonsai, and this price was fantastic to give it a try. Plant came in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: verybluejenny

customer_reviews.title: Looks Dead
customer_reviews.text: The tree looks dead and lost most leaves. Not sure if it is because I am not trimming or what. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer n

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing deal! Kit comes with everything needed to put together a Bonsai; Healthy plant, container, wire, screens, 2 quarts of Bonsai soil, pruning shears, moisture tray with stones, and clear directions!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Wells

customer_reviews.title: Dead upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Dead upon arrival, did as instructions said, just in case. Nope, it was still dead
customer_reviews.author: W. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: The azalea arrived in a great package as promised
customer_reviews.text: The azalea arrived in a great package as promised. Package contents include everything necessary to plant and enjoy the bonsai.
customer_reviews.author: Brace

customer_reviews.title: I really hope this isn’t what I purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is how my plant arrived! In a damaged box and the dirt everywhere. No directions no pot nothing! Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Forza

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition. Great packaging. The Jade plant was in perfect condition as well. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AJC

customer_reviews.title: Cool gift idea. Alot of work.
customer_reviews.text: The thing came in half dead, we've been trying to nurse it back to life. It's getting a little better
customer_reviews.author: Elissa

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this purchase! The box was put together very well and everything was protected nicely. The bonsai looked really good as well! This is my first bonsai so I am excited it arrived looking so good 😍
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: It bloomed and was beautiful and then died in the second month of our ...
customer_reviews.text: It bloomed and was beautiful and then died in the second month of our purchase. Bummer. Now I can't replace/return it.
customer_reviews.author: Cooljules

customer_reviews.title: If you are into Bonsai, Brussel's is the real ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are into Bonsai, Brussel's is the real deal. I bought 4 of different types and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: James J Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Received my bonsai yesterday and it was in great condition and packaged very nicely. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Bonsai tree
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his tree! It's perfect! All items came with it and the tree was very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Buell

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this thing for a few days but already looks amazing. Flowers started to bloom a few days out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice and fun to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend these Brussels Bonsais jade tree kits to anyone who likes plants. They are easy and fun to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Great beginning
customer_reviews.text: Great little tree! Perfect for beginners! Almost everything you need to get started at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mason

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit, but the satsuki was very dry, and is getting worse, I am following the instructions to see if get up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Infested with bugs
customer_reviews.text: Died right away. Started to come back to life and I noticed the soil was infested with little bugs. Do not have any problems with my other two from different companies.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Sellari

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long at all
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this plant with hopes that it would thrive. When it arrived, I followed all of the included instructions. After three months, it is now completely dead
customer_reviews.author: Josh Greenblatt

product_meta.title: Brussel's Live Dwarf Jade Indoor Bonsai Tree Kit - 3 Years Old; 6" to 10" Tall with Decorative Container
product_meta.description: Style:Dwarf Jade BonsaiOriginating in the dry regions of South Africa, the Dwarf Jade, or ‘Elephant Bush’, is a succulent plant, which explains its ability to store water for a long time. It is a very undemanding plant, well suited for individuals who travel often or who are prone to forget to water their plants. Thick, round, dark green leaves and delicate pink flowers sit atop fleshy stems and branches. These succulent features hold water for long periods of time. Though it grows to heights of 10 feet tall in its native habitat, it is an ideal bonsai for a beginner; this beautiful plant is easy to care for and will be a thing of beauty for years to come.
feature_bullets: SPECIES: Thick, round, dark green leaves and delicate pink flowers sit atop fleshy stems and branches. These succulent features hold water for long periods of time.
AGE/SIZE/CARE: Your 3 year old bonsai will arrive between 6" to 10" tall in a 6" container and will perform best indoors (see detailed care instructions in images)
USES: Ideal Mother’s Day gift, office & cubicle décor or a centerpiece for any kitchen table, desktop, window plant or outdoor décor.

WARRANTY: Your bonsai tree has been grown in a state-of-the-art greenhouse under precisely controlled conditions to achieve optimum health. If for any reason you are not completely satisfied with your tree or with our service, please notify us within 30 days of receipt. We will correct the situation to your satisfaction.
